quest.name: Proving Your Worth
journal:
 Quest Sync
The light-hearted hunter is eager to see what you can do.
objectives: Use the leather sack on a weakened Greatwood rail.
Deliver the bulging leather sack to the light-hearted hunter.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: Well met, ally of Ronka. Did you hear? Almet's recently returned with an astounding catch.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: She slew five Greatwood rails single-handedly. Five.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: Almet is without question one of our greatest hunters, but I am most curious to see how you would fare against them. If you would take up the challenge, meet with me at the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: You have come. Very good! I care not for how many you can capture, only how it is done. When you have weakened one, use this sack to capture it and bring it back here.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: Good luck in your hunt. I will be watching.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: I can see now why Almet speaks so highly of you. Your form was unlike anything I have ever seen. But what of the Greatwood rail?

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: You have done well not to bruise the feathers or the skin. We can make good use of this.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: Yes, such a prize warrants a reward. Meet with me at Fanow and I will see you compensated for your trouble.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: For you, oh great hunter, and ally of Ronka.

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: I will see this to Almet and─

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: <gasp> She will ask where is my quarry!

dialogue.name: VIISHUNTER03471
dialogue.text: What a fool I am. I should have been hunting with you. Perhaps if I can hunt four and offer them together with yours...
